title: Claude Moore Colonial Farm: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       Claude Moore is a working farm. As such, there are some things to consider during your visit.  Farm animals should not be petted or teased Carry water during the warmer months, especially on hot, humid days The Washington D.C. area experiences hot, humid days in the summer.  Temperatures during the fall and winter months can be cold.  Wear appropriate clothing for the weather.  Do not pick or collect plants from the Farm Pets are not permitted on Farm grounds
